summary: A video sharing website where users can upload videos and download them.

existing_features.title: Build a video upload page where users can select a video file from their device, enter a title and optional description, and submit the upload. Show a progress bar during the upload process.

Build a video library page that lists all uploaded videos with their thumbnail placeholder, title, description, uploader name, upload date, and file size. Each entry should include a Download button and a Play/Preview button.

Implement the video download functionality: when the user clicks Download on a video, the app fetches all chunks from the backend, assembles them into a Blob, and triggers a browser file download with the original filename.

Apply a bold, modern dark-themed visual design with vibrant accent colors (e.g., deep charcoal backgrounds, electric teal or amber highlights), clean card-based layouts, smooth hover transitions, and consistent typography. The design should feel like a professional media platform.

new_feature_requests.summary: Create a backend data model to store video metadata including title, description, uploader name, upload timestamp, file size, and a unique video ID. Implement canister storage for video binary data using stable memory or chunked uploads.

Implement backend API methods: uploadVideoChunk (to receive chunked video data), finalizeUpload (to commit and store the complete video), getVideoMetadataList (to list all uploaded videos), getVideoChunk (to retrieve video data in chunks for download), and deleteVideo.
